name: API Test 01: Find the distance between two places and verify if the status is OK

When I send valid request to Distance Matrix API

testSteps.description: API Test 01 #2: {origin=Washington,DC, destination=New York City, NY, units=metric}

children.description: Given that I want to find the distance between Washington,DC and New York City, NY in metric
When I send valid request to Distance Matrix API

userStory.storyName: Find distance between two places using the Google Maps Distance Matrix API
userStory.narrative:
The Google Maps Distance Matrix API is a service that provides travel distance and time for a matrix of origins and destinations,
based on the recommended route between start and end points.

featureTag.name: Find distance between two places using the Google Maps Distance Matrix API

title: API Test 01

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given that I want to find the distance between <origin> and <destination> in <units>
When I send valid request to Distance Matrix API
Then the status is 'OK'
